# init(exporting:)

**Initializer**

Creates a type that exports a group activity for the specified item.

## Declaration

```swift
init<ActivityType>(exporting: @escaping (Item) async throws -> ActivityType) where ActivityType : GroupActivity
```

## Parameters

- **exporting**: A closure that creates the [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity] for the given item.
title: init(exporting:)
